website_summaries.verdict: Great for simplified, single-room temperature control (though multi-room sensors are now optional), at a price point that will make new smart thermostat users comfortable with the investment.
pros: Temperature is easy to read even across the room
Installation, including power extender kit, is straightforward and simple, even for inexperienced owners
Responsive tech support and in-app installation guide are a nice plus
Works well with Echo and HomeKit
cons: Scheduling feature is somewhat limited, some users feel
Alexa voice features are limited to temperature set commands
Monitoring data lags behind actual air temperatures

customer_reviews.title: This worked great for the first six months
customer_reviews.text: Run, run the other way! This worked great for the first six months. Then it started going on and off and our saga with customer service began. We have been on the phone over six time for a total of more than 10 hours. Guess what they won't do - replace a broken echo bee because they won't acknowledge anything can go wrong with them. They led us to believe it was a problem on our end, $150 later the election says everything is fine and it is the echo bee. After 4 months of this we give up and have a different brand working just great. It is so hard to just stand behind your product?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The Ecobee was easy to install with very easy to follow step by step instructions. It was also easy to program with the interface on the thermostat. I did download the app and was able to navigate it with no problems and now can control my thermostat when out of the home which is nice when the kids forget to turn down the heat in the winter or decide to have it snow in the summer. The weather feature is nice but I am not sure how often I will use it. I am getting Alexa so will update on the voice control feature through that.
customer_reviews.author: JudyL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful UPDATE:Bad programming/voltages
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and setup. I replaced another brand of smart thermostat with the Ecobee Lite. This unit was easier to install and does a better job of monitoring the correct temperatures. Update: 60days into using this unit and it began to fail to start the compressor correctly. The HVAC tech said the triggering voltage was too low and caused a stutter in the hard start of the compressor. This made the unit run unattended (when not home to realize it) because the air would just circulate and not get colder.
customer_reviews.author: Matt W

customer_reviews.title: It works now but how many years will it work without problems.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a HVAC engineer with 35 years of running my own company. Learned from experience, I tend to go with the "Keep It Simple Stupid" approach. My Honeywell mercury bulb, dumb thermostat has worked well for 15 years. I was happy with it. My son, wanting to get me up to date, bought this stat. as a present. It took me about 5 min. to install. Now I like it. It does have some advantages, but it takes some getting used to. The app could be better. I don't use it with Alexa and I have not used tech support. The real question is how long will it work without problems?
customer_reviews.author: David Buaas

customer_reviews.title: Is not as smart or automated as expected
customer_reviews.text: So fare I am disappointed in this product. My #1 disappointment is the “automation” of heat settings based on being home or away, and temperature differences set for different times of day. I set up my thermostat and entered all my information and temperatures, and the thermostat just can’t get it right. It changes temps or doesn’t at the wrong times and the wrong temps and it’s scheduling does not work at all. So basically I spent over $100 on something that I ended up using manually just like my old analog thermostat. Much like other so called “smart” devices, this has fallen way short of expectations.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy nugent

customer_reviews.title: my best friend
customer_reviews.text: this thermostat is my best friend. I have it set up with my alexia, I use the app, and I use it on my wall. it has style, and it works so great and its very easy to use. I like showing my friends that I can set my heat from there homes and other people are inquiring about this product and I have nothing but great things to say about it. also I can check to see if anyone forgot to set the temp lower when no one is home and I can set my temp higher before I get home. I love this product and I will always buy things like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not play well with Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: This would be the best thermostat on the market except for that fact that they have totally neglected the Alexa skill for it. looking back on it now I wish I had gone with the Nest because of the integration the Nest has with Alexa is so much better. On the Ecobee all you can do with Alexa is raise and lower the temperature setting. That's it. You can't even ask Alexa what the room temperature set to much less anything else. Ecobee needs to step up there game on this Alexa skill. Right now it is sub-par.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Hookup is easy, just check all resources online.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is mint. I’m away from home a lot and needed to monitor my home temperature so I know my temperature is maintaining and my pipes don’t freeze. All furnaces and boilers have different connections so you have to apply the connections according to your particular aquastat. Mine is a Honeywell 8148 the diagram for mine below is easy with only heat, no fans or AC T>——W——-< W Boiler W>——B——-< C. Thermostat TV>——R——-<Rc
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Stockwell

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great service, needs to improve basic features
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Great customer service. Bought two for a community center. While it was easy to setup, they need to fix the following: 1. Allow scheduling at 15 minute increments (like Nest) rather than 30 minutes. 2. Multiple thermostats can be grouped together to follow a single schedule. Once grouped, the web interface or the app do not state which thermostat's schedule will be followed, nor does it give an potion to choose the schedule. I will update my rating once these two issues are resolved
customer_reviews.author: AShop76

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my house nice and cool in South Florida heat
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my house nice and cool in South Florida heat. Don't have to think about the thermostat because with the settings, it turns on once it goes 1 degree past your threshold, only had it for a few weeks so have not seen the power bill yet, but I'm optimistic because the A/C is not on all the time like before. Installed it watching a quick YouTube video and the instructions, very simple, had to attach the adaptor for the power wire as my thermostat only had 4 18 awg wires, 45 minutes to install, very happy with this and hooks up to your WiFi network easily. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: anate6

customer_reviews.title: NO PUSH NOTIFICATIONS
customer_reviews.text: This unit DOES NOT have "push notifications." This is a huge weakness as your furnace could be out and if you live in the north the temp could be -10 indoor and all you get is an em. I get hundreds of ems a day and sometimes to not get to all of them until evening. Nest gives push notifications, my video cams send push notifications and so on but, not Ecobee. I have written letters to the CEO about this and he does not answer. The unit is easy to set up and even worked with my 34 year old furnace.
customer_reviews.author: S. Huhta

customer_reviews.title: Modern Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to install with helpful videos. I have added Sensors to complete and balance the system. Now I can check and adjust my AC/Heating system from anywhere. I want to see how the Ecobee handles very hot outside temperatures and I'll update when the local weather (South Texas) gets hot. The free app includes Home IQ that builds a report of usage.
customer_reviews.author: NeT

customer_reviews.title: Great smart thermostat
customer_reviews.text: We love this thermostat! We set a schedule so the thermostat automatically adjusts. We have a non-standard work schedule so it was nice that it let us copy days. I recommended the Ecobee to my family and friends. We have the app on our phone and can check and adjust the temperature. I also like the change filter reminder. Set up was a bit tricky because we have a very old furnace. Also, the Ecobee support incorrectly told us to pry apart the device when it was already open, so now it's a bit damaged on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price. Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic, so easy to setup, luckily I had a c-wire already in the wall and I just had to connect to the transformer at the furnace and plug it into the thermostat. It does however come with an accessory to make a c-wire if you do not have one or a place to run one but I did not need to use it. It also comes with a white wall plate to cover up all the old holes in the wall and makes for a fantastic presentation. My home is smaller and I did not need to spend the money on the ecobee with the other 'room sensors'.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dietter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gadget, does exactly as advertised, very clear instructions. I have a C wire so didn't need the included power extender. Here's the one thing I had an issue with: They put the most unreliable, unusable level on the thermostat base. You need a real level to install this thing, the bubble level is an absolute joke. But on a positive note, great display, great mobile interface and website.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyG/YTWB

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to program for our heat pump system
customer_reviews.text: The thermostat had to be programmed three separate times to work as it should with our heat pump system. We called three days in a row and spoke with three different techs to get the problem resolved. The techs were very helpful and knowledgeable but the programming I felt was complicated. Our computers work well with the router we have but the Ecobee3 shows that the signal is weak and it keeps losing wifi which we have to reset. Odd since the computers in different rooms including downstairs work fine. Once the thermostat was programmed for our heating system we have been happy with it except for the wifi problem.
customer_reviews.author: Wicky

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of smart thermostats and this one is really slick and easy to use, especially using the smart phone app to set schedules. Beware that if you over ride the setting it stays at that temp until you cancel the over ride. I thought it would return to the schedule at the next change point but you have to cancel your selection before it goes back to schedule. Not a problem except that you have to remember.
customer_reviews.author: P. Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Put some cash back in your pocket. This does it all and will save you $$.
customer_reviews.text: 15 minutes from start to finish using a screw driver, some putty and a spatula. I installed one on each floor and these are truly a breeze to install and setup. 10 minutes more and I was synched to smartthings and my google homes. Controlling these simple devices from anywhere in the world and voice operated from most places in my home. Smartthings knows when I leave and quits heating/cooling, and kicks it back on when I come home. Save the cash, don't buy $200+ thermstats when this does it all and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Chris A

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermostat! Stylist and High Tech.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these to replace my "dumb" thermostats at home. Setup is pretty simple. Make sure to turn off electric to the old ones while removing them and installing the new ones. The only issue I have: 1 of them keeps disconnecting from the WiFi at home. I usually have to unplug it and re-plug it back in to get it to connect. Not sure what is up with it, but since you can set your perfect settings on it, so I didn't feel like it needed to be returned as I barely use the app to change the settings on them. Overall, great alternative to the Nest Thermostats!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Myford

customer_reviews.title: Okay Product, Terrible Support
customer_reviews.text: Installation was not that hard, but if anything doesn't work, just return the device. Keeping it and trying to use their support line is worthless as they will not stand by their product. They refuse to replace a failing unit and continue to "troubleshoot" after one year, while forcing you do go through very technical debugging with no improvement to show for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Love the controls on our phones!
customer_reviews.text: After figuring out some incompatibity issues with our existing 'heat pump kit' (which was 'fighting' with the new thermostat, and had to be disabled by a HVAC technician, to the tune of a $200 service call), the Ecobee Lite seems to be working well. We still need to figure out why the thermostat is regularly sending us messages that the Auxiliary Heat is running "more than 60 min in the past 24 hr period".
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Nice product with some problems.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent thermostat for the money. I got it for 140 through Amazon Warehouse. Not quite up to Nest but very close. Installation was fairly easy and they have a lot of help to get you through it if you have problems. It works great with Alexa and setup was simple and painless. I took one star off because setting the temp with the slider on the touch screen is a pain and if you're thermostat isn't at eye level it's impossible to read. You have to bend over. Major design flaw. Also mine crashes once in a while when you use the touchscreen audit take 15 minutes to restart.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lenzmeier

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Apple Homekit compatable Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Great product .. I was debating between ecobee3 and the nest and went for ecobee3 lite because it was Apple HomeKit compatible. I setup this up with a system that only has 2 wires. I ordered a 24 VOLT AC TRANSFORMER from Amazon for $9 dollars which gave me RC and C cables to power the thermostat. Its was easier this way then messing with the cables in my basement. Existing wires connect to RH (red hot wire) and W (boiler wire)﻿ and the wires from 24 Volt transformer goes to RC and C The apps works fine ... i wish they had a way to add users to the app without sharing your login info.
customer_reviews.author: shake007

customer_reviews.title: ahhh
customer_reviews.text: Ok, the instructions are excellent besides the C-wire (you must have one for this thermostat). If you download the app before starting the installation. They have videos and you can take photos! On my particular furnace it was labeled Com instead of just C (I just wish they have included the Com in the tutorial) but they were available to call and email! Plenty of settings, schedule, comfort, vacation, set reminders, and set alerts.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Who needs a Nest!?
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a truly “smart” thermostat, look no further, the Ecobee is the way to go! I compared the Ecobee to the Nest and the Ecobee has far more and superior features for a much cheaper price! Do yourself a favor, buy the Ecobee, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: The Shark

customer_reviews.title: This thermostat is awesome. Love the clean lines
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat is awesome. Love the clean lines, bright display, super easy user interface, and ability to easily set and adjust schedules from the ecobee app and/or Siri from my devices. Installation was slightly tricky at first (didn't have a "C" wire, and had a few extra wires going into the furnace control board that I wasn't entirely sure what to do with), but overall it's pretty straight-forward if you find yourself handy with a screwdriver and have some basic knowledge of electronics. I'm wondering why I didn't get this sooner. Takes our heating and cooling firmly into the 21st century.
customer_reviews.author: David P

customer_reviews.title: Works well.  Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a month. It does what it is supposed to do and the website is very clear. I like the looks and having used this product and the Nest, I prefer the touchscreeen on the ecobee over the rotate and push interface on the nest. The installation instructions were comprehensive and the inclusion of the adapter for installations without a common ground provides help that many people would need.
customer_reviews.author: H Z

customer_reviews.title: Lite version works with sensors now
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, sleek looking thermostat. I got an email on 3/22/17 saying that the ecobee3 lite now works with room occupancy sensors, so I see no need to get the regular ecobee unless you save a few bucks in the bundle or something. The regular ecobee is also slightly different shaped, and just a little larger as well. I am now happier with my ecobee3 ever since they released occupancy sensor capability.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, a bit confusing but their Tech Support is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: My old Thermostat didn't have a maker for a "C" or Common cable, but I had one. Not seeing this cable made me get on the phone with Tech Support, I sent the guy some pictures of the wiring on both sides and he told me I wouldn't need the Power Extender Kit. Installed it successfully and it works great with Alexa. I also love the way it looks on my wall.
customer_reviews.author: David and Brittany Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Thermostat!!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of features and a nice presentation. Screen lights up when I walk up to it to show the current settings. Allows me to set time zones for temperature settings, get the weather at a glance, and connect it to my Wi-Fi so I can use Alexa to change the setttings by voice command. Also has a nice iPhone app to change or view the settings. Easy to install with what was shipped with the unit, and a very reasonable price! I would highly recommend this thermostat to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: John Shadel

customer_reviews.title: Great product but 4 stars because of install difficulty
customer_reviews.text: Great product but 4 stars because of install difficulty. Eco bee did not have any answers for me not did the online community. The wiring for my central air unit was nothing like the diagrams, with a little tinkering i got it working. Overall the product looks very modern and is not an eyesore to have on your wall but more of a tech show off piece
customer_reviews.author: sick02ss

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for diy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and ended up removing it the next day after installing. The system would not boot so I called customer support, the call was answered promptly. After troubleshooting we decided to remove it, now the hvac is unresponsive. Not recommended for diy. This will cost time and more money to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Trane Dual Zone with Dampers
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately for me, these will not work. I purchased 2 for my Trane Dual Zone system with electronically controlled dampers. As the thermostats connect to a Trane Comfort Link control board, they do not work for me. I sent photos to Ecobee support but they were unable to assist. I am fairly certain that someone familiar with the Comfort Link controller could make them work but it would probably cost me as much as the purchase of 2 to have a good Trane tech make them work. Providing this review to warn others that have dual zone systems with damper controllers that it is probable that these will not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rose

customer_reviews.title: customer support was horrible. you're better off getting a programmable old school ...
customer_reviews.text: make sure you have a C line otherwise you won't be able to install it. we have central air and heat and this product won't work with it. customer support was horrible. you're better off getting a programmable old school thermostat for $20.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Love the Ecobee so far. It's got a great display, the interface is sharp, and the app is quick.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Ecobee so far. It's got a great display, the interface is sharp, and the app is quick. There's even a web-app that lets you adjust settings. The only thing I feel it's missing are settings to adjust the interface/default layout. I'd love different color options or an option to have the weather pop up first. Installation was also a breeze since I already had the C cable run to my old thermostat. Since this is the lite version it doesn't have a couple of options the more expensive ecobee has so make sure you know what you're buying!
customer_reviews.author: Kyser

customer_reviews.title: Installed in about 90 minutes and the directions were easy enough to follow
customer_reviews.text: Installed in about 90 minutes and the directions were easy enough to follow. I had an issue immediately after installation - which turned out to be my fault and I realized it during troubleshooting with the tech rep over the phone. I think it's a really good product so far, though 75 minutes on hold was far too long to wait.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and configure. I change the temperature using my iPhone remotely at work before coming home. Works well with my Echo dot "Alexa - set home temperature to 70". It comes with a nice looking round back plate about twice the size of the unit to cover the old thermostat holes. I have a "C" wire on my current thermostat which makes for a very easy install but it comes with an extender item that is suppose work for installations that don't have a 'C' wire present. A little pricey, but a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: BKeen

customer_reviews.title: Would have been great but a problem caused me to buy the full version
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to get the lite since I only had one room and didn't need the sensors. Followed the guides but my furnace still didn't kick on. Tried doing the PEK wiring and even changed my wiring but still no dice. Decided to call in ecobee support which led to them telling me the device is faulty. I returned this and got the full version and has been working fine since. Never found what the deal was with the lite version.
customer_reviews.author: Paul lalo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I had to watch a third party YouTube video to install because I have a heat pump and the instruction manual doesn't really mention how to work through that. Word of advice, download the app first and it will walk you through a more detailed breakdown than the manual. Anyway, the heater was on when set to cool until I googled, so make sure you know if you have a heat pump. Other than that, simple install and I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonazing

customer_reviews.title: So great to be laying in bed and not having to ...
customer_reviews.text: So great to be laying in bed and not having to go downstairs to turn the AC on if it's too hot in the bedroom. Or to turn on the heater on a cold day when you are an hour away from your house and you want it to be toasty when you get there. And I can also see if my house is on fire if I am at work if I look at the app and the temperature is over 1000. I love this thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Just installed today, but customer service is awesome. We have an older HVAC unit without the standard control board terminals. Emailed back and forth with customer service over about an hour to make sure power extender pack was correctly installed. Pictures and all. Great experience with setup. Once connections were done, working like a charm. Extremely easy install/setup.
customer_reviews.author: Will Gray

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the Ecobee3 Lite is the best thermostat on the market and the Ecobee support team ...
customer_reviews.text: Before investing in the Ecobee3 Lite I reviewed the competitors, Nest and Honeywell, to name a few. Hands down the Ecobee3 Lite is the best thermostat on the market and the Ecobee support team is top-notch. I was having a bit of trouble with the installation at the furnace end so I gave Ecobee support a call. Dave/David, Ecobee support, stayed with me on the phone the entire time walking the entire setup. Hats off to Dave/David for the support. Ecobee3 lite works with Alexa and SmartThing hub. I love that I can control and monitor the Ecobee thermostat while away from home. I will recommend Ecobee3 to all my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MEEHHH! Its not all that without sensor feed
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really been able to use it as the power extender for the C wire that goes in the ac unit sucks and doesn't retain the wire. Keeps popping out and I have to climb on the roof to reseat it. The few times it has worked seems ok. Accidentally ordered the ecobee3 lite instead of Ecobee3 regular version. No sensor use with it. Probably going to return it if I can't get the wires to stay in the adapter
customer_reviews.author: ShawnT5953

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have a primary a primary residence in Alabama and a second home in Tennessee where I set the thermostat on 40 degrees whenever I was returning to Alabama. Until I installed ecobee, I worried about freezing pipes when temperatures were forecast to be in the teens in TN. Now I can raise the setting on the thermostat in TN from Alabama on forecasted very cold days and this has alleviated my concerns about potentially frozen and burst pipes. I had a C wire which made installation a snap.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: what a great product
customer_reviews.text: We travel a lot and it's nice to be able to monitor what's going on at home, even from thousands of miles away. It was tough to install but the tech folks helped me. I'd have given it 5 stars if it wasn't for the install headache. I plan to get one more soon so all our zones are set with one.
customer_reviews.author: Headed South

customer_reviews.title: ... Lite for about a month now and am extremely pleased with the quality of the product and ease of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Ecobee3 Lite for about a month now and am extremely pleased with the quality of the product and ease of installation. I use Alexa to increase or decrease temperature and it works well. It would be nice if I could ask Alexa to resume the programmed temperature but since I have it set to resume on the next program change, it is mostly unnecessary. I have already used it in a vacation mode and it resumed perfectly on return and we came home to a warm house. I even had the temperature bumped up for a few hours while we were gone for the housekeepers visit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Love this system. i spend the night over at a friends house to get to one of the places i work at faster. It has been 15 to 10 degrees out the last couple of days. This morning i was able to turn my heat up to keep the house warm, but not roasting. I usually keep the heat down until i am about 4 miles away and then i turn it up for me to be all cozy when i come home.
customer_reviews.author: Joel R White

customer_reviews.title: Super easy install, works great with Samsung Smart Things
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install the product, the app walks you through the process very clearly. The integration with Samsung Smart Things is excellent and works great with the different "routines" I have in SST. On Ecobee's website, the Ecobee 3 refurbished is being offered at $70 off, so that may be something to see if they have before you buy the Lite. If you don't care about the room sensors just grab the 3 lite.
customer_reviews.author: Pal

customer_reviews.title: Included with the Ecobee were labels for the wires making it very easy to connect on the new thermostat
customer_reviews.text: We have had the Ecobee3 Lite thermostat for about 2 months. I installed the Ecobee app on my iphone before installing the thermostat. It gave clear instructions with photos on how to install the new thermostat. Before disconnecting the old thermostat, the instructions had me take a picture with my phone. Included with the Ecobee were labels for the wires making it very easy to connect on the new thermostat. Had to call tech help after installation. Did not have to wait very long to speak with someone. The person was very helpful and knowledgeable. Got everything working and setup correctly( we have a heat pump with a gas furnace). The Ecobee keeps the temperature at a more even temp.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W.

customer_reviews.title: Plug and go!
customer_reviews.text: We love this thermostat! So easy to use and has a nice, simple look. Integrates with Alexa and is expandable - you can add room sensors. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DMF

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great price
customer_reviews.text: I installed this thermostat at vacation home so I could monitor the temperature and change remotely. I can view remotely and monitor the current inside and outside temperature along with how long the system has been running. I like the Siri feature but does only appear to work while on site. I might work remotely if I leave an iPad or Apple TV onsite? In the winter I do drain water pipes and leave heat on low just as precaution. With old thermostat I could set temperature down as low as 40, but the Ecobee only goes down to 45. Would be go if future firmware updates would allow us to set temperature lower.
customer_reviews.author: azonie

customer_reviews.title: Love it! But no thermostat sensors?
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Love it! Love it! This awesome guy who works on my house told me that now I just need a sensor with a thermostat to set up in the the hotter zones of my house, to trick the main thermostat. However, from what I gather, the sensors function primarily to turn on the unit and they do not have thermostats built in. Maybe the next gen will have this?
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Best out there for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase the Lite version cause I didn't care about the additional sensors and to me hat was the only difference between this and the regalar model that cost almost $100 more. Easy to install with good directions. Once issue, make sure to connect the cables properly. Unit did not work after 2 days. Called customer service and they told me one cable was connected wrong. I corrected it and it's been smooth sailing ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excelent tech support!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and product! Note that I needed to make some wiring changes at my 20yr old furnace (had to add isolation relay). Definitely more than your average homeowner would want to do, however, the Ecobee site has a great application guide that can tell you if your wiring is OK as is or not. Plus Ecobee tech support is outstanding. A real and intelligent person answers the phone everytime even on the weekends.
customer_reviews.author: DaveB

customer_reviews.title: Great product but far more difficult to set up then ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but far more difficult to set up then advertised. I had to speak with the Customer service hotline for 35 mins before I was able to successfully install the Ecobee3. I tend to be technically savvy and rather handy but this one gave me some difficulties in setting up.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: Love at first sight! Super easy to install, took 15 minutes. The hardest part of installation was putting in the wall anchors. As soon as I plugged it in and opened the app, it was amazing to connect to, a toddler could do it. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: kfarns

customer_reviews.title: Love it - you will want them on all your HVAC systems
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Ecobee 4 for my main floor and basement (where one HVAC system covers both) and liked it so much that I bought the Ecobee 3 for upstairs. Very intuitive installation and use and I love the app. My brother has the Nest - but the option of remote sensors with these units beat it out.
customer_reviews.author: kmkuhn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to download and set up app, easy to integrate with Alexa. No issues and it works perfectly and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay C Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, super easy to program, iphone app works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the interface for the iphone and how I can control everything from my phone or the wall unit. The controls look exactly the same on both, my phone's app and the wall unit, and when you use the phone, it just takes seconds to sync. The wall unit looks very nice and it was easy to program. It is a great thermostat!
customer_reviews.author: Luis R. Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermostat at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a thermostat like this for some time. I had spoken with a friend who installed this and was happy with the Ecobee3 lite so I thought I'd give it a try. This was incredibly easy to set up, I had it up and running within an hour of receiving the package and have been trying different settings and schedules since it was installed and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: jthiel

customer_reviews.title: Love the thermostat but the installation was not easy
customer_reviews.text: Love the thermostat but the installation was not easy. We came from a honeywell system and the wiring was different than the installation manual specified so we ended up blowing a fuse in our furnace while on a 2hr phone call with ecobee. Now that it's fixed and installed it works amazing. Very user friendly and the app is great, you can adjust your house temperature from another room or even away from your house.
customer_reviews.author: Jordin Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Best bet for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best thermostat on the market. Support is fantastic if you need it and the analytics you get through the cloud are also great. But basically it;s a great thermostat that has all the automation you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Quasitron

customer_reviews.title: Great product, get the "4" though!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great thermostat and the sensor is awesome. Went out and bought the ecobee4 for my upstairs (with alexa built in). convenient to have alexa upstairs and not have to buy a dot. Thanks Ecobee!!!!
customer_reviews.author: rick901

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for upstairs and downstairs systems in a new house. Very impressed with installation, function, appearance—the whole deal. And now that the Ecobee3 Lite supports remote sensors (as of March 2017), I may add a few of those to our system. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, looks nice, wish there was more then 3 preset temperature settings - maybe an option to add/name a setting so in case there are user preferences for multiple people being home at different time patterns (besides home, away, sleep)
customer_reviews.author: Inna Fedorova

customer_reviews.title: Alexa and Ecobee -- a winning combination
customer_reviews.text: This is Great. Saves $$$$ on my heating bill. The installer set it up to blow the warm air out after heating is stopped for 60 seconds or so. Don't leave hot air in the ducts. Works great with Alexa!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart thermostat and I was able to install myself sicne the directions are great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Smart thermostat and the directions were spot on! I love being able to remotely monitor the temperature and change if needed. I also like using the IFTTT.com app where you can sync the Ecobee app with the IFTTT app and it will send you alerts when your temp falls below a set point!
customer_reviews.author: Createaneutron

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, awesome convenience
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, awesome convenience, still figuring out the scheduling set up, it looks great on my wall. Spend extra time to refinish your wall so that you don't have to use the finishing plate.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksey Semenyuta

customer_reviews.title: Great product Pain to setup
customer_reviews.text: Great product Pain to setup, since most older thermostats do not have a common 24v line, but tech support online was really good. Look into other newer ecobee products, i love the wifi ability to make any changes from my iPhone
customer_reviews.author: Max Smirnoff

customer_reviews.title: Phone app no longer works
customer_reviews.text: The phone app has become unusable after an update 2 months ago and attempts to mine data from app users, the app no longer gets past the "add address screen". I bought this thermostat to change the temperature on my phone in a remote Airbnb for guests which I no longer can do.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer support.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermostat and attempted to install it. Looked easy and it should have been. Little did I know that the seller of our home installed the A/C as an add on unit which complicated things because it had it's own transformer and air handler.. After 3 hours on the phone, a dozen or so emails with pictures and lots of new wiring skills, it is finally working. Thanks to the awesome support of David A and the entire Ecobee team , it is all installed. looks and works great. Smart looking unit with touch screen. Control your heat from the thermostat, Alexa, mobile device or on the Ecobee website.
customer_reviews.author: Akhuilon

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for me at this time
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work as advertised with my system and customer service although were very polite they were out sourced from Asia and very difficult to understand. Not a good fit for me at this time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Scott Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Bought two and very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I did not get this for free either. Bought 2 of these. I would have liked the non-lite version but price was getting too steep. The instructions for installation were extremely well done imho. I was immediately able to coonect this to Samsung Smartthings and Alexa through Smartthings Skills. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGeek

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME to watch and control house temps when away from home or out of the country.
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME to watch and control house temps when away from home or out of the country.
customer_reviews.author: Frogmaster333

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and be up and running. We love that now we can turn on our system and cool or heat the house when we are away. It is also great to be able to monitor what is going on remotely.
customer_reviews.author: J. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for a smart thermostat.
customer_reviews.text: Super annoying. It keeps trying to control itself. I have no settings put in and it randomly shuts itself off then I have to do a factory reset to get it to start back up. I don't like coming home to a house that is pushing 90 degrees. I plan on putting the old one back up, I'm tired of no A/C.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade to simple setback thermostat.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Easy to program. Easy to use. Great job with the hardware, software, and user interface. I've had a programmable setback thermostat for over 20 years so I wasn't sure what I'd gain with a smart thermostat. The ease of use and additional functions made upgrading to the Ecobee3 worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: A. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have both the Ecobee3 and the Ecobee3 lite. Since this thermostat controls the heat (radiators) in only one room the lite version was fine. Where the thermostat operated the heat/ac in multiple rooms I picked the regular echobee3. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: NIck

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermostat. The app makes it so easy to set. We had to have a professional install it as we only had a 4 wire, we originally had a 3 wire. Well worth it. The features are easy to understand & the vacation setting is very good to have. We did not get a remote sensor as we like the upstairs bedrooms cool.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Mom

customer_reviews.title: The house wires could not be attached due to the ...
customer_reviews.text: The house wires could not be attached due to the attach fixture was unable to secure the 24 AWG wires.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Love this thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermostat. Though I cant say I noticed any savings over my old thermostat, that ability to adjust the temp via app is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good, but would be nice if it worked with the motion sensors.
customer_reviews.author: Cable Free Since 2003

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and setup. Comes with adapter necessary for systems that have no "C" wire - saves ~$30 in that scenario.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Mostly very happy, wireless works well except there's been 4-5 instances ...
customer_reviews.text: Mostly very happy, wireless works well except there's been 4-5 instances where the unit goes offline and you have to take it off the wall to reset it. Other than that, great product. Works very well w homekit
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The ecobee 3 lite has exceeded all my expectations! Our furnace is running more efficiently than it has in the past. It was an easy install and the customer support was very helpful! It works with Amazon echo and Apple Home Kit. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S.

customer_reviews.title: So kewl we can monitor our indoor temp in Mesa ...
customer_reviews.text: So kewl we can monitor our indoor temp in Mesa while we’re in Canada and adjust if need be . Very very supportive and caring staff 🤗
customer_reviews.author: chet

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Got the app and was able to change temperature from work. Shows the humidity level on the main screen as well. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Monique W.

customer_reviews.title: Best invention every
customer_reviews.text: I love this ecobee!! It makes things so much easier. My favorite thing is I can schedule ahead of time and then I don't have to remember if turned the head down or not.
customer_reviews.author: klbldj

customer_reviews.title: Used and broken
customer_reviews.text: I received this and it had obviously been returned by another customer and was broken. The wire terminals were snapped off and other parts were missing. Returned and purchased a "new"one.
customer_reviews.author: John E.

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I choose the ecobee
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing device. I did not have a C wire. Still super easy to install. The iPhone app is as intuitive as the be thermostat itself. I would recommend this over the nest for several reasons: 1) looks 2) ease of use 3) it iPhone intervention and Alexa intervention is flawless 4) install was amazingly easy. Enjoy this item!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very modern, very stylish
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and feel of this thermostat, but it wouldn't work with my 20+ year old Honeywell system. If it works with your system, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent thermostat. Installation instructions are very clear and easy to follow. Setup was simple and immediately linked to Alexa and smart phone. Control the temperature from anywhere in the house or away. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DTex

customer_reviews.title: Cool thing
customer_reviews.text: Cool thing. Install was easy, even without a common wire. I did have a question about alternate wiring, and their customer service was responsive and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: BBQ

customer_reviews.title: Works great. replaced a 15 yr old digital T-stat with ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. replaced a 15 yr old digital T-stat with this. It is more efficient than the old one due to the fact it will cut on/off closer to the set temp. Seemed like the AC came on more but ran for less time. Southern NM 100+ for 30 days plus. Bill decreased 8-12% over the summer. Almost paid for itself in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER T.

customer_reviews.title: Ecobee
customer_reviews.text: I had problems setting up the wires. My old thermostat used the w2 wire to turn on the heat strips. Ecobee uses w1. Once I figured that out I was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nowactive

customer_reviews.title: Ecobee 3 Lite Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works great. I am able to set times zones while away and on vacations. Nice graphics on the main web page. Syncs up nicely with my in home WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: SB  Bend, OR

customer_reviews.title: Just makes sense
customer_reviews.text: Solid, simple, and easy to use. Really impressed with the set up instructions and online help videos. I was able to set it up in less than 30 minutes and program it shortly there after. I purchased so that I could better control the times and temperatures I wanted set during the week. I also tend to take last minute trips away from the house and this allows me to control it from anywhere and alert me when something may not be working.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome just wished I waited for version 4
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I put this in 4 weeks ago, it works great haven't had an issue as of yet, but I read that the best version 4 coming out is rumored to have Amazon Alexa built into the thermostat which is brilliant. Sucks I didn't wait longer to buy but that's life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Software works good for me. Works great and the best part is, it makes my wife happy to have the right temperature at the right time.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Penn

customer_reviews.title: and the main thing I like about this thermostat is that it is not so ...
customer_reviews.text: We have an electric heat pump, and the main thing I like about this thermostat is that it is not so quick to kick on the auxiliary heat. I don't use the app much, but do program it from the web. I also really love the weather on the screen, which is just quicker for me than getting a phone or computer out.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Braun

product_meta.title: ecobee EB-STATe3L-01 3 Lite Thermostat, Wi-Fi, Works with Amazon Alexa
product_meta.description:
This is a limited quantity launch. Buy yours while supplies last.

Live better and save more with ecobee3 lite. With its beautiful design, easy-to-use touchscreen display and impressive average savings of 23% annually on heating & cooling, the ecobee3 lite will make your home smarter and more comfortable without costing you or our planet. *Learn more at ecobee.com/savings.

Works with Amazon Echo, Apple HomeKit, Samsung SmartThings, and IFTTT. We want you to love our products as much as we do, so your ecobee comes backed by a 3-year warranty.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately).
Save an average of 23%* on heating and cooling costs (*Learn more an ecobee.com/savings)
Your ecobee3 lite powers on through the C and Rc terminal. Be sure to insert your R/Rc/Rh wire in the Rc terminal of your ecobee3 lite thermostat.

Fast, easy installation - install your ecobee in 30 minutes or less. The step-by-step guide on our mobile app and free expert support make it easy.Smarter comfort - your ecobee understands your local weather, schedule and desired comfort settings, to ensure your home is at the right temperature at the right time
Personal energy reports - get free monthly reports on how much energy you’ve saved and tips on how you can save even more
Peace of mind - your ecobee monitors your heating and cooling systems and alerts you If it senses that something isn’t working properly. Refer userguide before use
ASIN B01K48T09Y has a newer model B06W56TBLN

specifications.Included Components: Thermostat, PEK, hardware pack, instructions, wire labels, mounting plate, trim plate
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars525 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
